title: The Ultimate Crypto Legal Guide To Structuring Your DAO
author: irinaheaver@gmail.com
description: In the dynamic Web3 world, DAOs are a central component. This ultimate legal guide unravels the complexities of choosing the correct legal structure for DAOs.

title: Zero-Knowledge Cryptography Offers A Solution To The Dangers Of Corporate Surveillance
author: ap@aleo.org
description: Out data online is used for purposes and in ways outside of our control. A new technology called zero-knowledge cryptography offers a solution to that problem.
